greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: n-th derivative of x^(1/x) at x=1.
link: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..200
formula: a(n) = Sum_{k=0..n} Stirling1(n, k)*A003725(k). - _Vladeta Jovovic_, Oct 02 2003
mathematica: Function[ n, Series[ (1+x)^(1/(1+x)), {x, 0, n} ]//(Table[ SeriesCoefficient[ #, i ]*i!, {i, 0, n} ])& ][ 20 ]
a[n_] := Sum[ StirlingS1[n, k]*Sum[ (-j)^(k-j)*Binomial[k, j], {j, 0, k}], {k, 1, n}]; a[0] = 1; Table[a[n], {n, 0, 21}] (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Nov 28 2012, after _Vladeta Jovovic_ *)
NestList[Factor[D[#1, x]] &, x^(1/x), 22] /. (x -> 1) (* _Robert G. Wilson v_, Feb 03 2013 *)
results.author: _Olivier Gérard_
